Description.Name: LRM Ammo (Containment)
Description.Details: Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Ammo Bins will explode and damage their installed location when they receive a Critical Hit. Containment LRM Ammo Bins are reinforced to contain half of the destructive force when an ammunition explosion occurs, but contain only 90 rounds of ammunition per ton. Explosion damage per ammo: 0.1
